sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_0b672e72db40334054d8ff621f961936
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getStcokRoomType</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var types = []; 
	var item = new GlideRecord('x_naci_e_tracking_stockroom_type');
		item.orderBy('name');
	    item.query();
	 while(item.next()){
		 var type = {};
		 type.id = item.sys_id.toString();
		 type.name = item.name.toString();
		 types.push(type);
	 }
          
	return types;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_e_tracking/etrack_rest_api/getStcokRoomType</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getStcokRoomType</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-11 16:02:23</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>0b672e72db40334054d8ff621f961936</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getStcokRoomType</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NCI Equipment Tracking System" source="x_naci_e_tracking">0d1eac28dbbfaf0054d8ff621f9619b2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NCI Equipment Tracking System">0d1eac28dbbfaf0054d8ff621f9619b2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_0b672e72db40334054d8ff621f961936</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-11 16:06:56</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="ETrack REST API">ac0dd2b6db00334054d8ff621f96192b</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_css"><sp_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css>@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Merriweather:400,700');

@font-face {
  font-family: 'Merriweather Web';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 700;
  src: url('https://v2.designsystem.digital.gov/assets/fonts/merriweather/merriweather-bold-webfont.woff2') format('woff2');
}

a {
  font-weight: 600;
}

a:hover {
 	text-decoration: underline;
}

p {
    margin: 0 0 20px;
}

.serif {
  font-family: 'Merriweather',Cambria,Times New Roman,Times,serif;
}


.navbar {
  margin-bottom: 0;
  border: none;
}

.navbar.navbar-default {
  min-height: 0px;
  border-bottom: none;
}

.navbar-default .navbar-nav .nav-link,
.navbar-default .dropdown > .dropdown-toggle {
  padding: 7px 5px;
  margin-right: 15px;
  border-bottom: 3px solid transparent;
  border-top: 3px solid transparent;
  transition: background-color .15s linear;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.navbar-default .dropdown > .dropdown-toggle {
  border-color: transparent !important;
}

.navbar-default .navbar-nav .nav-link + .nav-link {
  margin-left: 10px;
}

.navbar-default .navbar-nav .nav-link:hover,
.navbar-default .navbar-nav .nav-link:focus,
.navbar-default .navbar-nav .nav-link.active,
.navbar-default .navbar-nav > .active > a, 
.navbar-default .navbar-nav > .active > a:hover, 
.navbar-default .navbar-nav > .active > a:focus {
  color: #2f2f2f !important;
}

.navbar-default .navbar-nav .active > .nav-link {
  border-bottom-color: #162e51;
}


.navbar-nav {
	margin: 0;
}

.navbar-inverse {
  min-height: 0px;
  border: none;
}

.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav .nav-link {
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-bottom: 7px solid transparent;
  border-top: 7px solid transparent;
  transition: background-color .15s linear;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav .nav-link:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav .nav-link:focus,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav .nav-link.active {
  color: #2f2f2f !important;
  background-color: #fff;
}

.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav .active > .nav-link {
  border-bottom-color: #14819b;
}

.navbar-default .navbar-nav > .active > a, 
.navbar-default .navbar-nav > .active > a:hover, 
.navbar-default .navbar-nav > .active > a:focus {
     background-color: white;
}

.panel {
  border: none;
}


.v-align-top {
  vertical-align: top;
}

::placeholder,
::-ms-input-placeholder,
::-ms-input-placeholder {
  color: #595959 !important;
}

.md-errors-spacer { display: none; }

table .md-button {
  padding: 0 6px 0 6px;
  margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;
  min-width: 60px;
  border-radius: 0px;
  font-size: 13px;
  height: 20px;
  line-height: 20px;
  min-height: 20px;
  background: 
  
}

.md-button.md-default-theme.md-primary.md-fab, .md-button.md-primary.md-fab, .md-button.md-default-theme.md-primary.md-raised, .md-button.md-primary.md-raised {
    color: white;
}



.md-button {
  text-transform: none;
}


.blue-panel{
    background-color: #162e51;
    color: white;
    height: 40px;
}
.badge {
    display: inline-block;
    min-width: 10px;
    padding: 3px 7px;
    font-size: 12px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: black;
    line-height: 1;
    vertical-align: middle;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-align: center;
    background-color: white;
    border-radius: 10px;

}


.form-control{
  	width: 90%;
}


table th{
  font-size: 13px;
}

table td{
  font-size: 13px;
}

md-toolbar.md-default-theme:not(.md-menu-toolbar), md-toolbar:not(.md-menu-toolbar) {
    background-color: #004A70;
    color: white;
}
md-toolbar {
  min-height: 10px;
  max-height: 50px;
}

.ribbon{
  background-color: #162e51;
}


[disabled] md-input-container .md-input, md-input-container .md-input[disabled] {
color: black;
}

md-select.md-default-theme[disabled] .md-select-value, md-select[disabled] .md-select-value {
  color: black;
}

.disabledForm{
  background: #F5F5F6;
}

.md-toolbar-tools h1, .md-toolbar-tools h2, .md-toolbar-tools h3 {
  font-size: 120%;
}


.md-subheader.md-default-theme.md-primary, .md-subheader.md-primary {
    color: #004A70;
}

.pagination > .active > a{
  background-color: rgb(63,81,181);
  border-color: rgb(63,81,181);
}

.small-button {
  padding: 0 6px 0 6px;
  margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;
  min-width: 60px;
  border-radius: 0px;
  font-size: 13px;
  height: 20px;
  line-height: 20px;
  min-height: 20px;  
}

</css><name>nci-etrack.css</name><sys_class_name>sp_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-22 21:31:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4bcf00addbfba300b86770c08c9619c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>126</sys_mod_count><sys_name>nci-etrack.css</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NCI Equipment Tracking System" source="x_naci_e_tracking">0d1eac28dbbfaf0054d8ff621f9619b2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NCI Equipment Tracking System">0d1eac28dbbfaf0054d8ff621f9619b2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_css_4bcf00addbfba300b86770c08c9619c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>abdullahz2@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-30 20:46:09</sys_updated_on></sp_css></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>etrackUpdateAsset</name><script><![CDATA[function etrackUpdateAsset($http){
	this.updateAsset = function(form){
		return $http({
			url: '/api/x_naci_e_tracking/etrack_rest_api/updateAsset',
			method: 'POST',
			beforeSend: function(xhr){xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', window.g_ck);},
			headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
			data: form
		});

	};

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-14 17:07:27</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e503923fdbc8730054d8ff621f96199f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>etrackUpdateAsset</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NCI Equipment Tracking System" source="x_naci_e_tracking">0d1eac28dbbfaf0054d8ff621f9619b2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NCI Equipment Tracking System">0d1eac28dbbfaf0054d8ff621f9619b2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_e503923fdbc8730054d8ff621f96199f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>abdullahz2@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-14 17:10:02</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>etrackAddAssets</name><script><![CDATA[function etrackAddAssets($http){
	this.proccessModel = function(form){
		return $http({
			url: '/api/x_naci_e_tracking/etrack_rest_api/addAsset',
			method:"POST",
			beforeSend: function(xhr){
				xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', window.g_ck);
			},
			header: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
			data: form
		});
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-12 21:50:14</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>7bcffc57db04734054d8ff621f961968</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>etrackAddAssets</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NCI Equipment Tracking System" source="x_naci_e_tracking">0d1eac28dbbfaf0054d8ff621f9619b2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NCI Equipment Tracking System">0d1eac28dbbfaf0054d8ff621f9619b2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_7bcffc57db04734054d8ff621f961968</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-03 14:07:52</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_447387bbdb00b30054d8ff621f961995
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>etrackTransferAsset</name><script><![CDATA[function etrackTransferAsset($http) {
	this.transfer = function(form){
		return $http({
			url: '/api/x_naci_e_tracking/etrack_rest_api/transferAsset',
			method: 'POST',
			beforeSend: function(xhr){xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', window.g_ck);},
			headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
			data: form
		})
	};
	this.completeTrasnfer = function(form){
		return $http({
			url: '/api/x_naci_e_tracking/etrack_rest_api/completeTransfer',
			method: 'POST',
			beforeSend: function(xhr){xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', window.g_ck);},
			headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
			data: form
		})
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-14 20:39:00</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>447387bbdb00b30054d8ff621f961995</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>etrackTransferAsset</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NCI Equipment Tracking System" source="x_naci_e_tracking">0d1eac28dbbfaf0054d8ff621f9619b2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NCI Equipment Tracking System">0d1eac28dbbfaf0054d8ff621f9619b2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_447387bbdb00b30054d8ff621f961995</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>abdullahz2@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-14 21:21:54</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_e021fb3adb44334054d8ff621f961943
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>fetchUserList</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	 var users = [];
	 var searchCriteria = request.queryParams.term.toString();
	 var term = searchCriteria.split(" ");
	 var length = term.length;
	 var firstName = term[0];
	 var lastName = term.pop();
 
	 var user_item = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	 var tmp = user_item.addQuery('first_name', 'STARTSWITH', firstName);
		 tmp.addOrCondition('u_preferred_firstname', 'STARTSWITH', firstName);
         if(length > 1) {
			 user_item.addQuery('last_name', 'STARTSWITH', lastName);
		 }
         user_item.query();
	 
	while(user_item.next()){
		 var value = user_item.getDisplayValue('first_name') + " " + user_item.getDisplayValue('last_name');
		 var label = value;
		 var id = user_item.getDisplayValue('sys_id');
		 var email = user_item.getDisplayValue('email');
		 var phone = user_item.getDisplayValue('phone');
		 var title = user_item.getDisplayValue('title');
		 var manager = user_item.getDisplayValue('manager');
		 var manager_id = user_item.manager.sys_id.toString();
		 var id_number = user_item.getDisplayValue('employee_number');
		 var institution = user_item.getDisplayValue("department");
		 var doc = user_item.getDisplayValue("u_long_org_division");
		 if (email) {
			 label += "  [" + email + "]";
		 }
		 users.push({label: label, value: value, id: id, email: email, phone: phone, title: title, id_number: id_number, manager: manager, manager_id: manager_id, institution: institution, doc: doc});
     }
   
     return users;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_e_tracking/etrack_rest_api/fetchUserList</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/fetchUserList</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-11 21:24:36</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e021fb3adb44334054d8ff621f961943</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>fetchUserList</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NCI Equipment Tracking System" source="x_naci_e_tracking">0d1eac28dbbfaf0054d8ff621f9619b2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NCI Equipment Tracking System">0d1eac28dbbfaf0054d8ff621f9619b2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_e021fb3adb44334054d8ff621f961943</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-11 21:26:34</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="ETrack REST API">ac0dd2b6db00334054d8ff621f96192b</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_848ba7fadb04334054d8ff621f96197b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>addLocation</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var data = request.body.data;
    var name = data.name.toString();
	
	var location = new GlideRecord('x_naci_e_tracking_location');
		location.initialize();
		location.name = name;
	var id = location.insert();
	return id;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_e_tracking/etrack_rest_api/addLocation</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/addLocation</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-11 21:01:31</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>848ba7fadb04334054d8ff621f96197b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>addLocation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NCI Equipment Tracking System" source="x_naci_e_tracking">0d1eac28dbbfaf0054d8ff621f9619b2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NCI Equipment Tracking System">0d1eac28dbbfaf0054d8ff621f9619b2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_848ba7fadb04334054d8ff621f96197b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-11 21:01:31</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="ETrack REST API">ac0dd2b6db00334054d8ff621f96192b</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
